subject: College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Bill Self, the coach who guided the Kansas Jayhawks to their first N.C.A.A. championship in 20 years, signed a 10-year, $30 million contract. Self’s previous contract had three years left, but the new deal is retroactive to April 1.
snippet: Bill Self, the coach who guided the Kansas Jayhawks to their first N.C.A.A. championship in 20 years, signed a 10-year, $30 million contract. Self’s previous contract had three years left, but the new deal is retroactive to April 1.
